thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Wandsworth Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: weekend away
thread.title_full: weekend away - Review of Premier Inn London Wandsworth Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PhilWard
title: weekend away
text:
First time of staying here - the Hotel was very quiet - lovely and clean and comfortable - the staff were really friendly and helpful
there is a shopping precinct opposite with a large selection of shops
a 4D cinema which we tried and enjoyed
lots of various eateries
good transport links the bus stop is right outside we made good use of this too with no problems
would happily stay here again in the future
